4682dae4-7592-4531-ad6e-580ca932abf6.description: Successful leaders think critically and leverage information to solve problems and make informed decisions. This four-week 100% online course teaches you how to use data analytics for problem solving and critical thinking.
4682dae4-7592-4531-ad6e-580ca932abf6.name: Essential Analytical Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Essential Analytical Skills course is required.

e6de91d8-891f-4de5-b644-7cce294cd356.description: This four-week, 100% online course is design to examine how people are crucial to the design and development of every organization. It helps leaders enhance their business through its people by providing techniques to formulate HR strategies, analyze talent requirements, and determine future talent needs.
e6de91d8-891f-4de5-b644-7cce294cd356.name: Human Resource Talent Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Human Resource Talent Strategy course is required.

fd602444-d859-4053-93ae-4fde83e02774.description: This four-week 100% online course covers four essential focus areas. From leadership in the management role, to leading people and processes, to leadership behaviors that overcome challenges, you will explore the tools necessary to be an effective leader. On top of that, you’ll discover how to leverage the Myers-Briggs Type Indicator Assessment to better relate and respond to your team.
fd602444-d859-4053-93ae-4fde83e02774.name: Leadership Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Leadership Essentials course is required.

e09d6d02-f824-429f-a539-480ec1f2fab4.description: Step up your leadership skills, starting with the basics in this four-week 100% online course. As a leader, the four primary focus areas in this course can help you in your management role. From leading and managing, to defining the best practices for managing diversity in the workplace, to effective decision making and communication, to people management basics.
e09d6d02-f824-429f-a539-480ec1f2fab4.name: Management Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Management Essentials course is required.

c5058665-3190-47fa-8024-4726615d5685.description: Logistics' roles in 21st century supply chains require a thorough understanding of Manufacturing Planning and Control systems. In this 100% online course, you’ll discover a variety of decision tools. This can enhance your planning and execution skills which can assist your career and potentially increase your organization’s bottom line.
c5058665-3190-47fa-8024-4726615d5685.name: Manufacturing Planning and Control

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Manufacturing Planning and Control course is required

68bfbde0-aec7-4efe-abe6-cdfc6e982e8d.description: This course builds on the fundamentals of Supply Chain Management I to help you determine the best supply chain design for your operations with SCOR processes. You’ll be able to recognize the characteristics and objectives of inventory, transportation, warehousing, and material handling. Throughout this eight-week 100% online course, you can further strengthen your supply chain essentials.
68bfbde0-aec7-4efe-abe6-cdfc6e982e8d.name: Supply Chain Management II

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Supply Chain Management II course is required.

5c6753f4-d34e-42d5-9f7e-2bf9d617818c.description: Learn how to develop a forward-thinking approach to meet performance goals by aligning HR & company strategies, recruiting talent, and managing and developing talent. This four-week, 100% online course provides you a firm foundation to build the mission, vision, and goals of your organization.
5c6753f4-d34e-42d5-9f7e-2bf9d617818c.name: Building High-Performance Organizations

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Building High-Performance Organizations course is required.

1afc4f09-7c32-45e5-98cb-b8b8f2959fe8.description: In this four-week 100% online course, you’ll learn how to evaluate your organization’s culture, adjust culture through attitude, and align your culture to the global environment. Some benefits of this course include being able to better understand the mission, vision, and goals of your organization as well as establish values and shape attitudes to connect the people within your company and create a strong culture.
1afc4f09-7c32-45e5-98cb-b8b8f2959fe8.name: Developing Organizational Culture

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Developing Organizational Culture course is required.

1a5e6cb5-b6b3-4e0f-b91b-9f8097132031.description: To ensure your customers are satisfied, you’ll want to gain an integrated view of procurement, operations, and logistics management. By the end of this eight-week 100% online course, you will obtain an understanding of the fundamentals of supply chain management. A few of the topics covered include manufacturing and integrated planning, advanced planning and schedule, supply chain globalization, and more.
1a5e6cb5-b6b3-4e0f-b91b-9f8097132031.name: Supply Chain Management I

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Supply Chain Management I course is required.

cb4aaa09-6774-4188-8f5f-b2a0b96b6e17.description: In this course, you’ll learn why digitized business processes and data analytics are essential to stay ahead of the competition. Successful managers ask the right questions, understand big data, assess past performances, and predict future performance. Throughout this eight-week, 100% online course, you’ll examine real-world cases of success and failures with analytics-based business strategies.
cb4aaa09-6774-4188-8f5f-b2a0b96b6e17.name: Analytics for Competitive Advantage

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Analytics for Competitive Advantage course is required.

1fbeb673-2831-4cd5-9c79-1d96462c7229.description: In this 100% online eight-week course, the skills you’ll learn can be applied across various industries in businesses. You’ll explore how to mine and model across departmental silos and systems to solve complex issues like increasing efficiencies, developing innovative strategies and optimizing processes. Other data analysis capabilities taught include techniques for analyzing social media, geospatial, mobile, location-based, video, and imagery data.
1fbeb673-2831-4cd5-9c79-1d96462c7229.name: Applying Business Analytics

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Applying Business Analytics course is required.

257e0f42-f1cf-482f-ba95-130e1334f6e0.description: With the increase in data, there is an increasing need for data savvy managers who know how to find the nuggets of valuable data to optimize business performance and identify new opportunities. In this 100% online eight-week course, you will discover knowledge in databases, uncover hidden patterns, provide insights, refine strategies, and make decisions with big business impact.
257e0f42-f1cf-482f-ba95-130e1334f6e0.name: Data Mining and Management Strategies

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Data Mining and Management Strategies course is required.

e4e603c0-8d56-4843-b342-24459fbcf6df.description: Learn to identify the interrelationships between “marketing channel structures” and “logistics distribution structures” in this eight-week, 100% online course. You’ll learn how to develop, implement and manage a market distribution strategy for your logistical operations.
e4e603c0-8d56-4843-b342-24459fbcf6df.name: Distribution Fulfillment

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Distribution Fulfillment course is required

879bd5dc-9b3e-4525-947f-34fe278678da.description: This four-week, 100% online course provides the tools and tactics to assess the impact of drivers and disruptors on your business so that you can create the best strategy for a competitive advantage. You’ll learn how to understand the speed of change, utilize key strategic drivers for the rate of change, strategize ways to avoid disruption and embrace chance, and select the strategy for changing your organization.
879bd5dc-9b3e-4525-947f-34fe278678da.name: External Market Drivers and Disruptors

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the External Market Drivers and Disruptors course is required.

00554c1f-34a4-4511-bc5c-82c8ab0a84f8.description: By exploring tools like globalEDGE, Company Readiness to Explore (CORE), and International Partners Selection (PARTNER), you’ll develop the capabilities to coordinate and integrate your functions across global supply chains. Learn how to integrate your global logistics, purchasing, operations and market channel strategies in this 100% online course.
00554c1f-34a4-4511-bc5c-82c8ab0a84f8.name: Global Supply Chain Management

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Global Supply Chain Management course is required.

235c5149-0d72-4079-a1d4-b08d9c3b9f17.description: Cover critical topics designed to help you make improvements that can drive competitive advantages in this 100% online course. You’ll learn how to design and manage movement as well as store and flow goods which are important to the success of businesses across industries.
235c5149-0d72-4079-a1d4-b08d9c3b9f17.name: Integrated Logistics

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Integrated Logistics course is required.

e508cc8c-e171-403a-a368-9bf4016939fa.description: Professionals from every industry can benefit from effective negotiation skills because we all use negotiating tactics in our lives. In this 100% online course, through practice, you’ll strengthen your skills in intra-organizational, team, multi-party and cross-cultural negotiations. You’ll explore a broad spectrum of negotiation strategies including how to identify negotiation opportunities, address conflicts, understand unique challenges, and problem solve in competitive environments.
e508cc8c-e171-403a-a368-9bf4016939fa.name: Strategic Negotiation

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the Strategic Negotiation course is required.

b4fb682e-dc82-4f24-babd-b9db310e8436.description: Acquire the key skills to organize structure and the purchasing process, evaluate and select suppliers, assess risk management and global sources, manage negotiations and legal issues. As your progress through this 100% online course, you’ll learn how to develop and implement a procurement strategy that aligns with your supply chain strategy.
b4fb682e-dc82-4f24-babd-b9db310e8436.name: Strategic Sourcing

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Strategic Sourcing course is required

15900414-5d16-4204-98cf-f3603ed2af13.description: In this 100% online course, you’ll discover ways to improve buyer-supplier relationships to overcome supply chain management challenges. Learn how to provide strategic positioning and risk management assessments using academic and real-world perspectives.
15900414-5d16-4204-98cf-f3603ed2af13.name: Strategic Supply Management

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Strategic Supply Management course is required.

75aeb403-535b-4901-8306-5f6ecdbfa94e.description: In this course, you’ll learn the importance of sourcing various products and services. Some of the tactics you can gain include actively evaluating your suppliers, monitoring costs and metrics, expanding your supplier network, and vetting new opportunities. By the end, you’ll know how to foster supplier relationships and mitigate supply risks to improve your supply chain.
75aeb403-535b-4901-8306-5f6ecdbfa94e.name: Supply Base Management

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Supply Base Management course is required.
